Functions
ui.​incrementDrag
ui.incrementDrag = pigui.IncrementDrag

ui.incrementDrag(label, value, v_min, v_max, format)

Create a "drag with arrows and progress bar" widget

Example
value = ui.incrementDrag("##mydrag", value, 0, 20, "%dt")
Parameters
label

string, text, also used as ID

value

int, set drag to this value

v_min

int, lower bound

v_max

int, upper bound

format

optional string, format according to snprintf

Returns
value

the value that the drag was set to
